SIAT-VCC

Welcome to the Visual Computing Research Center

We are a research group at Shenzhen Institues of Advanced Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences. Our research mainly focus on Computer Graphics and Visualization. Our aim is to elicit the complex relationships and connections of real world and present a vivid virtual world.

Previous Next

We are located at Shenzhen City, a metropolis of innovation that links Hong Kong to Chinaâ€™s mainland. We are a part of Shenzhen Institutes of Advanced Technology (SIAT) of the Chinese Academy of Science (CAS) which was jointly established by CAS, the Shenzhen municipal government and the Chinese University of Hong Kong in February 2006. We also exchange ideas and work closely with many other computer graphics research groups.

We are looking for passionate new PhD students, Postdocs, and Master students to join the team (more info) !
